desc: Pottery Awesomeness is the original online pottery painting studio. We have the best selection of ready to paint ceramics with a unique and proprietary food-safe brush-on finish. One purchased = One donated. Pottery Awesomeness donates a kit of art therapy supplies to a child in the hospital for every purchase.

layout.text: The Original Online Pottery Painting Studio
Over 10,000 at-home pottery painting kits delivered
